divs: sighting detailsi noticed in the southwest sky a bright light. it seemed to move so i fixed my vision on a large blinking red communications tower in the distance to use as a reference point. after i fixed my vision i could confirm it was moving. it pulsed and lit up, several sparkling lights came from around it all over the same area. these lights were random and totaled about 5-6. i watched it travel across the sky in a southern direction. the light faded in the distance and another appeared in the same southwest location and repeated the same event. i woke my wife up from a sleep to come out and see the event. she confirmed the large object did in fact move right to left and up and down erratically. we both agreed it was not a star, plane, helicopter or satellite. she went back to bed and i continued to watch this light until it disappeared. it didn't seem to move away. i went into my home and sat in a chair looking out the window and another light appeared in the same location. this light repeated the same event of moving, blinking, and pulsed bright and moved in a western direction. after a 1\2 of watching i went to bed. we live in a rural area and there is little light pollution. i am familiar with the flight patterns which typically travel north to west and east to south across the sky. these events were not consistent with normal plane travels. i tried to photograph but the camera would not work because it was too far off in the night sky.
Summary: 3 bright lights lit up, moved erratically up and down, right to left with sparkling lights all around it in the sky
trends: There has been one other sighting in Freeland
There were no other sightings in Freeland on or around October 12th 2008
